transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Hello? Ji madam.
Customer: Yes sir. Yes sir, good afternoon.
Executive: Good afternoon, good afternoon.
Customer: Ji sir. Sir, main Madhu baat kar rahi thi sir, Royal Ruby T and Agaro ko se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Ji kal aapse baat hua tha mera.
Executive: Haan ji, haan ji sir, meri kal aapse baat hui thi.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Kal haan kal mam, kal sir aapki meri baat hui thi. To sir kuch like aap kuch ko aapko kuch puchna tha kya? Aap kuch missing reh gaya tha kya sir?
Customer: Haan, kal aap yaad kijiye kal aapse mera baat hua tha ki mera jo buyer lead jo aa raha hai, usme mera packing tea bolke nahi aa raha hai. Sab log ko loose chai ka jo hai, uska requirement aa raha hai.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Achha achha sir, kal maine ye cheez shayad aapko solve nahi ho paayi thi right? Ek baar main dekh leti hu, solve nahi ho paayi thi.
Customer: Aapne bola tha ki wo video call karenge bol rahe the.
Executive: Achha achha achha achha, ek second, ek second, main dekh leti hu.
Executive: Okay okay okay, ek baar Ruby ji. Haan haan, to sir maine aapka isme na changes kar diye the apne side se. To meri taraf se hona tha sir, meri taraf se to ho gaya hai. Lekin abhi main wo check karungi.
Customer: Haan ho gaya hai. Kal raat ko, kal raat ko mujhe mila wo packing tea wala. Aa raha hai, aa raha hai abhi aa raha hai.
Executive: Aa raha hai na? Maine kal aapke ispe work kiya tha. To maine kal aapka thoda sa mapping vagera change ki hai. To usse aapko thoda sa aapko aa raha hai ki nahi aa raha hai lead vagera?
Customer: Abhi aa, abhi lead aa raha hai. Kal do lead aaya tha. Haan aa raha hai. Hum isko sir. Ji.
Executive: Sir isse bas aapko kya karna hai? Aapko daily basis pe sir bas aapko call pick up karni hai. Client ki buyer ke phone aapko pick karna hai. Daily buyer consume karna hai sir, thik hai? Ah main dekh leti hu ek baar, kuch aur aapka account check kar leti hu. Behtar dekhne ke liye.
Executive: Transaction ho gaya. Haan, jaise ki dekhiye 17 tarikh ko aapne buyer consume. Sir kal aapne aaj aap 18 tarikh hai na? Aaj tak teen buyer consume nahi kiye. Aaj aapko buyer consume karne hai. Aaj hi buyer consume kariye.
Customer: Thik thik thik hai madam. Thank you so much madam.
Executive: Thik hai. Aur aur sir kuch aapko puchna hai?
Customer: Nahi abhi ke liye to nahi hai sir madam aap. Lead manager ka jaha pe option hai, haan iske baare mein bata deti hu. Haan dekhiye sir main phone pe bhi hu, main line pe hu, aap check kar lijiye.
Customer: Ji. Nahi madam, ab maine check kar liya.
Executive: Achha achha. Sir ab main ye batana chahti hu aapko, thik hai jo lead manager ka option hota hai na, aapne apne phone mein dekha hoga lead manager jaha pe dashboard likha hoga profile uske just niche lead manager ka option hoga.
Executive: Waha pe sir jitne bhi buyers aate hai wo aapke catalog ke through aate hai. Like unko direct inquiry hoti hai. Wo catalog dekh ke aapka ya fir aapke products direct dekh ke wo aate hai client. To usme aapko kuch karna nahi hai. Usme aapko sirf aapko accept karna hai unke message pe aur unke catalog ki link share karna hai. Niche dekhiye sir aap please kariye waha pe ek ek haan ek pe click kariye. Usme catalog link aa raha hoga.
Executive: Dekhiye aa raha hai ki nahi aa raha hai? Ek baar lead manager pe click kariye.
Customer: Lead manager mein hai na?
Executive: Haan. Lead manager pe click karne ke baad dekhiye usme likha hoga Roshan haan.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Haan usme dekhiye koi upar sabse pehla kaun hai usme? Koi dikh raha hai? Naam aaya hua hai message pada hoga.
Customer: Girish Girish Singh bolke aaya hua hai.
Executive: Haan haan uspe uspe click kariye.
Customer: Haan click kar liya.
Executive: Haan dekhiye niche ek pop up aa raha hoga catalog link ka.
Customer: Haan catalog link ka maine unko catalog bheja hua hai.
Executive: Haan thik hai haan. Haan bheja hua hai na? Bas bas wahi main bata rahi thi sir. Aapko jaise aapne inko bheja hai sabko sabhi ko unko reply karna hai. Jitne bhi client hai sabko reply karna hai.
Executive: Thik hai? Aur sir thoda sa aapko dekh leti hu. Ek sir main aapko ek cheez aur check kar leti hu. Ah product mein kuch dikkat to nahi hai. Baki photos vagera sabki proper submit do do teen teen photo lagi hui hai. To kuch bhi nahi karna hai.
Executive: Usme ek photo lagi hai na sir isme Ruby ki 50 gram, 12 gram achha thik hai isme thik hai.
Executive: Calls vagera aa rahi hai ki nahi aa rahi hai sir abhi?
Customer: Calls to nahi aa rahi madam. Call hum log ko hi karna pad raha hai.
Executive: Achha aapko hi karna pad raha hai. Calls ka main dekh leti hu apne end se ki calls kyun nahi aa rahi hai. Ah aapka account yaha pe kab IndiaMART kab wo hua hai? Kaun se month mein hua hai?
Customer: Do do mahine pehle hua madam.
Executive: Haan achha haan haan abhi aapko jyada time nahi hua hai sir. Teen do teen mahina ho raha hai right? September, October, November.
Executive: Ek second.
Executive: Call by lead, know your customer by lead inquiry.
Executive: Ek second. September mein aapko ek call aayi hai sir, October mein aapko call nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai main isse apne end se sir dekh leti hu. Ah ek baar aapko kal se fir isse agar kuch response milta hai to mujhe sir call karke bataiyega.
Customer: Thik thik hai madam.
Executive: Thik hai? Aur koi issue hai sir to aap puch sakte hai.
Customer: Abhi ke liye to nahi hai.
Executive: Haan haan thik hai number save kar lijiyega sir mera. Aapko koi bhi dikkat hogi mujhe call kar lijiye.
Customer: Thik thik. Thik hai sir. Thik thik. Okay sir. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Packing tea option not showing in buyleads.

- Not receiving calls.



Resolution:

- Changes made to the account.

- Explained how to use lead manager option.

- Checked the account and informed about pending actions.

- Assured to check why calls are not coming.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to inform if issue is resolved.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, packing tea, lead manager, calls
